## RemoveOpInfo type

`RemoveOpInfo` represents the information of the remove operation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RemoveOpInfo = {
    type: 'remove';
    path: string;
    key?: string;
    index?: number;
};
```
